languages.text: Постановление, носящее заголовок "Декрет Антара, поправка №12", содержит поминутное расписание обязанностей каждого тюремщика и подробную систему наказаний для них же. Внизу стоит печать — "Одобрено губернатором колонии".

The ordinance, entitled "Anthar's Edict, Amendment 12," contains a minute-by-minute schedule of each prisoner's duties and a detailed system of punishments for them. At the bottom is a seal with the inscription: "Approved by the Colony Governor."
languages.original_text: Постановление, носящее заголовок "Декрет Антара, поправка №12", содержит поминутное расписание обязанностей каждого тюремщика и подробную систему наказаний для них же. Внизу стоит печать — "Одобрено губернатором колонии".

traits.locale_text: The ordinance, entitled "Anthar's Edict, Amendment 12," contains a minute-by-minute schedule of each prisoner's duties and a detailed system of punishments for them. At the bottom is a seal with the inscription: "Approved by the Colony Governor."

The ordinance, entitled "Anthar's Edict, Amendment 12," contains a minute-by-minute schedule of each prisoner's duties and a detailed system of punishments for them. At the bottom is a seal with the inscription: "Approved by the Colony Governor."

languages.text: Das Gesetz "Anthars Edikt, Zusatz 12" enthält einen minuziösen Zeitplan der Pflichten aller Häftlinge sowie eine detaillierte Auflistung von Strafmaßnahmen. Darunter befindet sich ein Siegel mit der Inschrift: "Genehmigt durch den Gouverneur der Kolonie."
languages.original_text: The ordinance, entitled "Anthar's Edict, Amendment 12," contains a minute-by-minute schedule of each prisoner's duties and a detailed system of punishments for them. At the bottom is a seal with the inscription: "Approved by the Colony Governor."

traits.locale_text: Das Gesetz "Anthars Edikt, Zusatz 12" enthält einen minuziösen Zeitplan der Pflichten aller Häftlinge sowie eine detaillierte Auflistung von Strafmaßnahmen. Darunter befindet sich ein Siegel mit der Inschrift: "Genehmigt durch den Gouverneur der Kolonie."

languages.text: Le décret intitulé « Édit d'Anthar, amendement 12 » détaille les devoirs des prisonniers, minute par minute, ainsi que les châtiments qui leur sont réservés. Un sceau figure en bas de page, accompagné d'une inscription : « Approuvé par le gouverneur de la colonie. »
languages.original_text: The ordinance, entitled "Anthar's Edict, Amendment 12," contains a minute-by-minute schedule of each prisoner's duties and a detailed system of punishments for them. At the bottom is a seal with the inscription: "Approved by the Colony Governor."

traits.locale_text: Le décret intitulé « Édit d'Anthar, amendement 12 » détaille les devoirs des prisonniers, minute par minute, ainsi que les châtiments qui leur sont réservés. Un sceau figure en bas de page, accompagné d'une inscription : « Approuvé par le gouverneur de la colonie. »

languages.text: 这项法令名为《安萨法令》修正案第12条，上面列出了每位囚犯的职责，精确到每分钟，还详细地写着针对每位囚犯的惩罚制度。法令落款处盖着一枚印章，写着“由殖民地总督批准”。
languages.original_text: The ordinance, entitled "Anthar's Edict, Amendment 12," contains a minute-by-minute schedule of each prisoner's duties and a detailed system of punishments for them. At the bottom is a seal with the inscription: "Approved by the Colony Governor."

traits.locale_text: 这项法令名为《安萨法令》修正案第12条，上面列出了每位囚犯的职责，精确到每分钟，还详细地写着针对每位囚犯的惩罚制度。法令落款处盖着一枚印章，写着“由殖民地总督批准”。

languages.text: El decreto, titulado «Edicto de Anthar, enmienda 12», contiene un horario al minuto con los deberes de cada prisionero y un sistema de castigos para ellos. Al pie puede verse un sello con la inscripción «Aprobado por el gobernador de la colonia».
languages.original_text: The ordinance, entitled "Anthar's Edict, Amendment 12," contains a minute-by-minute schedule of each prisoner's duties and a detailed system of punishments for them. At the bottom is a seal with the inscription: "Approved by the Colony Governor."

traits.locale_text: El decreto, titulado «Edicto de Anthar, enmienda 12», contiene un horario al minuto con los deberes de cada prisionero y un sistema de castigos para ellos. Al pie puede verse un sello con la inscripción «Aprobado por el gobernador de la colonia».

languages.text: 「アンサール法令、修正条項第12条」と題されたこの条例には、囚人それぞれの分刻みの勤務予定と詳細な懲罰制度が記されている。下部には「コロニー総督承認」の刻印入りの印章が押されている。
languages.original_text: The ordinance, entitled "Anthar's Edict, Amendment 12," contains a minute-by-minute schedule of each prisoner's duties and a detailed system of punishments for them. At the bottom is a seal with the inscription: "Approved by the Colony Governor."

traits.locale_text: 「アンサール法令、修正条項第12条」と題されたこの条例には、囚人それぞれの分刻みの勤務予定と詳細な懲罰制度が記されている。下部には「コロニー総督承認」の刻印入りの印章が押されている。

languages.text: "Anthar Fermanı'nın 12. Tadili" başlığını taşıyan bu yönerge, her mahkûmun görevlerini dakikası dakikasına belirten bir çizelge ile onlara uygulanacak ayrıntılı bir ceza sistemini içeriyor. Sayfanın altında ise şu yazının yer aldığı bir mühür bulunuyor: "Koloni Valisi tarafından onaylanmıştır."
languages.original_text: The ordinance, entitled "Anthar's Edict, Amendment 12," contains a minute-by-minute schedule of each prisoner's duties and a detailed system of punishments for them. At the bottom is a seal with the inscription: "Approved by the Colony Governor."

traits.locale_text: "Anthar Fermanı, Tadil 12" başlığını taşıyan bu yönerge, her mahkûmun görevlerini dakikası dakikasına belirten bir çizelge ile onlara uygulanacak ayrıntılı bir ceza sistemini içermektedir. Sayfanın altında ise şu yazının yer aldığı bir mühür bulunmaktadır: "Koloni Valisi tarafından onaylanmıştır."
